onCallSchedules.title: Active On-Call Schedules
onCallSchedules.description: The name of the On-Call schedules that are currently active for the team

webUrl.title: Team Dashboard
webUrl.description: The URL of the team's page in OpsGenie.

apiUrl.title: Team API URL
apiUrl.description: The URL of the team's CRUD route in OpsGenie's API.

webUrl.title: Service URL
webUrl.description: The URL of the service's page on OpsGenie.

isExternal.title: Is External?
isExternal.description: Describes if this Service is managed internally or by a third party.

team.title: Team
team.description: The team that owns this service.

username.title: Username
username.description: The name of the user as listed in OpsGenie.

role.title: Role
role.description: The role of the user as listed in OpsGenie.

timeZone.title: TimeZone
timeZone.description: The user's TimeZone as specified in OpsGenie.

locale.title: Locale
locale.description: The user's Locale as specified in OpsGenie.

blocked.title: Blocked?
blocked.description: Flags whether or not the user is blocked in OpsGenie.

verified.title: Verified?
verified.description: Flags whether or not the user is verified in OpsGenie.

createdAt.title: Create At
createdAt.description: Describes when the user was first created in OpsGenie.

webUrl.title: Web URL
webUrl.description: The URL of the user's page in OpsGenie.

currentlyOnCall.title: Currently On Call?
currentlyOnCall.description: Whether the user is currently on-call and part of an active rotation's cycle.

onCallDashboard.title: On Call Dashboard
onCallDashboard.description: The user's on call schedule dashboard link.

nextOnCallStart.title: Next OnCall Start
nextOnCallStart.description: The date and time at which user will start their next active rotation, taking all overrides into account.

nextOnCallEnd.title: Next OnCall End
nextOnCallEnd.description: The date and time at which user will end their next active rotation, taking all overrides into account.

teams.title: Teams
teams.description: The teams to which this user belongs.

currentlyOnCallFor.title: Currently On Call For
currentlyOnCallFor.description: The teams to which this user is currently on call for.

nextOnCallFor.title: Next On Call For
nextOnCallFor.description: The teams to which this user is going to be on call for next.

title: OpsGenie Escalation Policy
description: Blueprint defining an OpsGenie Escalation Policy.

rules.title: Rules
rules.description: A JSON object describing the conditional rules this escalation follows to determine who and when to alert.

repeat.title: Repeat
repeat.description: A JSON object describing the conditions under which this escalation should re-evaluate the rules.

team.title: Responder (Team)
team.description: The team to which this Escalation belongs.

tinyId.title: TinyId
tinyId.description: TinyId as referenced in OpsGenie to provide a more sequential and human readable value.

status.title: Status
status.description: Latest status of the incident as visible in OpsGenie.

createdAt.title: Created At
createdAt.description: Describes when the incident was first declared in OpsGenie.

updatedAt.title: Updated At
updatedAt.description: Describes when the incident was last updated in OpsGenie.

priority.title: Priority
priority.description: Latest priority assigned by responders in opsGenie to the incident.

webUrl.title: Web URL
webUrl.description: The URL of the user's page in OpsGenie.

impactedServices.title: Impacted Services
impactedServices.description: The services listed by responders as being impacted by this incident.

responders.title: Responders (Teams)
responders.description: The teams listed at responders or to which listed users as responders belong.
